body:
Yesterday I migrated my helm binary to v2.9.0-rc3 and it seem it's failing to download dependencies. It could be solved rolling back the helm to v2.8.1, the steps bellow will help to reproduce the issue.

## v2.9.0-rc3 - failling 
```
Giancarlos-MBPro:tmp grubio$ git clone https://github.com/gianrubio/helm-error-2.9.0-rc3
Giancarlos-MBPro:tmp grubio$ cd helm-error-2.9.0-rc3
Giancarlos-MBPro:helm-error-2.9.0-rc3 grubio$ ./helm version
Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.9.0-rc3", GitCommit:"60abcdca41f544caaecb224acbfb92aee11e1f6e", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.8.1", GitCommit:"6af75a8fd72e2aa18a2b278cfe5c7a1c5feca7f2", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Giancarlos-MBPro:helm-error-2.9.0-rc3 grubio$ ./helm dep update elasticsearch-operator
Hang tight while we grab the latest from your chart repositories...
...Unable to get an update from the "local" chart repository (http://127.0.0.1:8879/charts):
        Get http://127.0.0.1:8879/charts/index.yaml: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8879: connect: connection refused
...Successfully got an update from the "es-operator" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "incubator" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "coreos" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "gitlab" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "stable" chart repository
Update Complete. ⎈Happy Helming!⎈
Saving 2 charts
Downloading elasticsearch-operator from repo https://raw.githubusercontent.com/upmc-enterprises/elasticsearch-operator/master/charts/
Save error occurred:  could not download https://raw.githubusercontent.com/upmc-enterprises/elasticsearch-operator/master/charts/elasticsearch-operator-0.1.2.tgz: could not find a repo containing the given URL
Deleting newly downloaded charts, restoring pre-update state
Error: could not download https://raw.githubusercontent.com/upmc-enterprises/elasticsearch-operator/master/charts/elasticsearch-operator-0.1.2.tgz: could not find a repo containing the given URL

```

## v2.8.1 - working 
```
Giancarlos-MBPro:helm-error-2.9.0-rc3 grubio$ helm version
Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.8.1", GitCommit:"6af75a8fd72e2aa18a2b278cfe5c7a1c5feca7f2", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.8.1", GitCommit:"6af75a8fd72e2aa18a2b278cfe5c7a1c5feca7f2", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Giancarlos-MBPro:helm-error-2.9.0-rc3 grubio$ helm dep update elasticsearch-operator
Hang tight while we grab the latest from your chart repositories...
...Unable to get an update from the "local" chart repository (http://127.0.0.1:8879/charts):
        Get http://127.0.0.1:8879/charts/index.yaml: dial tcp 127.0.0.1:8879: getsockopt: connection refused
...Successfully got an update from the "es-operator" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "gitlab" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "incubator" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "coreos" chart repository
...Successfully got an update from the "stable" chart repository
Update Complete. ⎈Happy Helming!⎈
Saving 2 charts
Downloading elasticsearch-operator from repo https://raw.githubusercontent.com/upmc-enterprises/elasticsearch-operator/master/charts/
Downloading elasticsearch from repo https://raw.githubusercontent.com/upmc-enterprises/elasticsearch-operator/master/charts/
Deleting outdated charts
```
title: Helm 2.9.0-rc3 is failing to download dependencies
